Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-4574 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.18.0.kata0-1
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-4574 affecting package kata-containers for versions less than 3.18.0.kata0-1. An upgraded version of the package is available that resolves this issue.

Criterion.Comment: Package kata-containers is earlier than 3.18.0.kata0-1, affected by CVE-2025-4574
